text: Nummah Maryam baxi Qiisa usuk Yalla iyye mari (Nasaara kinnuk) koroositeh, Nabiyow keenik ixxic, tokkel Yalli Maryam baxa Nabii Qiisaa kee kay ina Maryam kee baax√¥ bagul tanim inkih Qidam faxek iyyaay? woh duddaah abe kaa kaltam, Yalli Qaranwaa kee baaxooy ken Nammayih fanal taniimih Reeda usuk-le, usuk isih faxam gina, Yalli usuk ummaan iimih dudda-li kinni
